name: Archery Islands
description:
It's a beach, It's a resort! It's an archery!!
The game of field archery in tropical island has appeared!
All targets are placed on the locations with exotic atmosphere of tropical resort!
Let's become Robin Hood in tropical resorts, by shooting all targets!

・Main Features

1. Simple and easy control.
Control is very simple!
Just hold a button to aim, and release your finger to shoot.
Anyone can able to experience the field archery easily.

2. Sense of tension and release.
Feel the tense of archery, by shooting an arrow by watching distance, wind, and
moving target! You'll feel the great exhilaration, after you win in great pressure!

3. Fascinating courses!
You can enjoy archery in places that are essential to the tropical resort!
Also, we designed some full-fledged courses that can still feel the mood of resort!
There are courses such as huge beach with palm trees, shooting down from cruiser,
target placed on pitching yacht, etc.

4. Two game modes.
We loaded two games that are held in various locations of this island!
In "Standard", you must hit the targets in each posts.
In "Score Attack", you must hit lots of targets within the time limits!
There are three courses in Standard, and six courses in Score Attack.
Let's aim the best records in all levels!
